org.apache.juneau.internal

Class Version

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.juneau.internal.Version

  • public class Version
extends Object
    Represents a version string such as "1.2" or "1.2.3"

    Used to compare version numbers.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Version(String versionString)
      Constructor

    • Method Summary

      Returns true if the specified version is equal to this version.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Version

        public Version(String versionString)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        versionString - A string of the form "#.#..." where there can be any number of parts.
        Valid values:
        • "1.2"
        • "1.2.3"
        • "0.1"
        • ".1"
        Any parts that are not numeric are interpreted as Integer.MAX_VALUE

    • Method Detail

      • isAtLeast

        public boolean isAtLeast(Version v,
                         boolean exclusive)
        Returns true if the specified version is at least this version.

        Note that the following is true:

        boolean b; b = new Version("1.2").isAtLeast(new Version("1.2.3")); // == true b = new Version("1.2.0").isAtLeast(new Version("1.2.3")); // == false

        Parameters:
        v - The version to compare to.
        exclusive - Match down-to-version but not including.
        Returns:
        true if the specified version is at least this version.

      • isAtMost

        public boolean isAtMost(Version v,
                        boolean exclusive)
        Returns true if the specified version is at most this version.

        Note that the following is true:

        boolean b; b = new Version("1.2.3").isAtMost(new Version("1.2")); // == true b = new Version("1.2.3").isAtMost(new Version("1.2.0")); // == false

        Parameters:
        v - The version to compare to.
        exclusive - Match up-to-version but not including.
        Returns:
        true if the specified version is at most this version.

      • isEqualsTo

        public boolean isEqualsTo(Version v)
        Returns true if the specified version is equal to this version.

        Note that the following is true:

        boolean b; b = new Version("1.2.3").equals(new Version("1.2")); // == true b = new Version("1.2").equals(new Version("1.2.3")); // == true

        Parameters:
        v - The version to compare to.
        Returns:
        true if the specified version is equal to this version.

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
